title: Grab a Pencil + A Cinema Oddity
googleplay:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
itunes:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
description: Matthew Socey discusses what films he's watched this past, what Facebook and Twitter have been watching plus tributes to Joel Schumacher and a cinema oddity from the John Waters world.
